content.title: Cilostazol
content.definition: Phosphodiesterase III inhibitor with vasodilatory, antiplatelet, and metabolic effects approved as first-line pharmacotherapy for intermittent claudication.

effects: Increased intracellular cAMP in platelets and vascular smooth muscle

indications.efficacy: Improves maximal and pain-free walking distance by 40-60%

dosing.timing: 30 minutes before or 2 hours after meals

contraindications.box_warning: Class III antiarrhythmic effects, contraindicated in HF
